---
id: list-audit-logs
title: "ListAuditLogs"
description: "Retrieves a paginated list of audit logs with support for filtering by date range, table names, actions, and usernames for compliance and monitoring purposes."

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"ListAuditLogs"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/audit"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a paginated list of audit logs with support for filtering by date range, table names, actions, and usernames for compliance and monitoring purposes.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"count","in":"query","schema":{"type":"number"}},{"name":"page","in":"query","schema":{"type":"number"}},{"name":"all","in":"query","schema":{"type":"boolean"}},{"name":"from_date","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"}},{"name":"to_date","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"}},{"name":"table","in":"query","description":"Comma serparated list of tables.","schema":{"type":"string","description":"Comma serparated list of tables."}},{"name":"action","in":"query","description":"Comma serparated list of actions.","schema":{"type":"string","description":"Comma serparated list of actions."}},{"name":"username","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"x-org-id","in":"header","schema":{"type":"string","default":"juspay"},"required":true},{"name":"x-tenant","in":"header","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

>
  
</StatusCodes>
